title: B Free Franklin Post Office, Philadelphia
description: In this episode, we are on the road in the Old City section of Philadelphia to get an inside look at the B. Free Franklin Post Office. We’ll learn more about how this historical landmark reflects the characteristics of the community, as our tour guides Sylvia Herron, a Customer Relations Coordinator at the Postal Service, and Tammy Scott - acting customer relations coordinator at the Postal Service guide us through the museum and Old City’s unique history.
author: mediacenter@usps.gov (United States Postal Service)
content:encoded: In this episode, we are on the road in the Old City section of Philadelphia to get an inside look at the B. Free Franklin Post Office. We’ll learn more about how this historical landmark reflects the characteristics of the community, as our tour guides Sylvia Herron, a Customer Relations Coordinator at the Postal Service, and Tammy Scott - acting customer relations coordinator at the Postal Service guide us through the museum and Old City’s unique history.

itunes:author: United States Postal Service
itunes:summary: This week on Mailin' It, we are on the road in Philadelphia visiting the Old City section of town filled with historical landmarks that date back to the earliest days of the United States. Join us, as we get an inside look at the B. Free Franklin Post Office and Museum, and talk about Old City’s unique history.
